data.answer: The degree of protonation of the phosphonate groups and thus the composition of the helical chains in solution are dependent on the pH of the reaction mixture.

What is the proposed formation mechanism of the helices?
data.answer: The formation of helices occurs via a hierarchical self-assembly route, involving twisted packing due to the geometric incompatibility of different types of chains.

data.answer: It serves as a buffer against pH change and as nucleation centers at which the helices grow.
